publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3612 Des McNulty: Clydebank Citizen of the Year 2009—That the Parliament congratulates Phyllis Gillan on receiving the prestigious accolade of Clydebank Citizen of the Year 2009; applauds her immense contribution and dedication to the tenants’ and residents’ association in her home village of Duntocher and in the Clydebank area, and welcomes the recognition of a lifetime of work dedicated to her community that this honour brings.

S3M-3612 Des McNulty: Clydebank Citizen of the Year 2009—That the Parliament congratulates Phyllis Gillan on receiving the prestigious accolade of Clydebank Citizen of the Year 2009; applauds her immense contribution and dedication to the tenants’ and residents’ association in her home village of Duntocher and in the Clydebank area, and welcomes the recognition of a lifetime of work dedicated to her community that this honour brings.
S3M-3612 Clydebank Citizen of the Year 2009 (lodged on 4 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3612 Clydebank Citizen of the Year 2009 (lodged on 4 March 2009) Karen Whitefield*
